A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Clocking in at just over two and a half hours\, this offering of the storied series feels needlessly bloated. A lot of superfluous  sprawling side quests that derail the important main story. There were inexplicable happenings that left me scratching my head (no spoilers). A few of the new characters were whimsical and fun\, and others seemed like sketches. The actors did a tremendous job with the material they got\, and the film LOOKED and SOUNDED great. It sneaks into the top 5 of star wars movies ahead of all the prequels\, but behind the original trilogy and force awakens.
